page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: This Domesday Survey block is in the far west of Greater{London.}Most of it lies within the Borough of{Hillingdon (a small part is in the Borough of {Ealing). The edges of the block cut across natural communities; for instance, Ickenham in the North West and North Hillingdon in the South West. The outside of the area is mainly {housing.}In the centre there is a lot of "open space", including two farms, an airbase and a sewage works. { Transport}is an important theme. Many people who live in the area travel to work outside it. Many commuters pass through every day on their way to and from work. Then, of course, there is the airbase.
